reviews.review: Game is fun, a little buggy, but there is a lot to love.
It fun
fun games
Muy divertido
very fun game, tense and scary at first!

A great game with a bit of a balance towards survivors, and that's how it should be. Killers, when the game began, were a bit too strong. Things have changed a lot, the game has become more fleshed out and more balanced. There's more content and people are still loving it. Definitely recommend for one of the most solid 4vs1 games out there!

EDIT: After the 3.7.0 update, I can say that things have progressed a bit in the direction of killers, but I think as of now, there still needs to be work done. Survivors have too much advantage as I have realized since the months I made the review originally. It is getting better, and the game is progressing in the right direction.

EDIT 2: Recent dealings of the developer to sell Hellraiser as an NFT have made me decide to change back to a negative review. We were all fooled into funding an NFT scam and BHVR have not been transparent about this as a start. NFTs are the worst idea we've had as a fad in a long time and anyone who says they're a positive is ignoring creative ownership of properties. You can't just claim something as an NFT and sell it as your own. Fuck off, BHVR.

EDIT 3: I don't know what to make of the game anymore, but I generally don't think it's in the best place. They haven't addressed the issue of getting randomly disconnected by the game itself as of April 29, 2022. Adding content is great, but not at the risk of the game's stability. Disconnects are prominent and killers doing garbage like tunneling is way more common than it used to be. I don't know if I can recommend it, although there are still fun moments to be had. Buy it to try it, or don't. If you have friends to play with, it's manageable.

Edit 4: As of June 24, 2022, it's okay, but I think after the new balancing changes, it could be better. Changing rating to a hesitant recommend.

EDIT 5: August 4, 2022 = game's in a better place and people are whining about it. Go figure.

It's fun to play as both sides, although I favor killer, I like to play survivor either by myself or with a couple friends. I think maybe it should be easier to unlock other characters without paying and some of the server/bug issues weren't there but overall I have been loving this game so far and I think it's a good time whether you're grinding by yourself or playing with some buds.

Also ignore the bullshit honor code, winning is winning it doesn't actually matter. -reps are like crack for me

If you like to grind, and you like to unlock abilities, than this is the game for you. For new players, this game does have some jump scares but you get use to it pretty fast. This game is very easy to learn and very easy to play just takes time. Both survivors and killers are pretty neat. Def worth the try at least

have got some time spent on this game and i love it alot and i would reccomend it.

however, killers are completely unbalanced and have perks that are extreamly broken. the down side to this game, is it is the most fun with "player made rules" such as following player ediquite such as: not camping hooks, not tunnling, and other things where if the killer choses to do so, combined with the right perk sets, the game is almost over every time at 4 gens repaired where no fun is had. Theres a hand full of killers where i want to DC just as soon as i see them, the hag, the canibal, the pig, the serpent, and freddie. If the game had a larger palyerbase, it would be neat if there was a bare bones mode with a select amount of killers that are broken, and no killer perks but also no trap door.

Game is very fun and scary at entry level. As you progress, you discover a rather deep meta and gameplay mechanics. Only downsides, I'd say, are the strength of Survivors at very high ranks, toxicity of the player base (although just ignore them), and the ranked-only matchmaking system. Custom games are highly entertaining too, with new challenges and lore introduced to keep the game interesting

Lo siento, pero la verdad no recomiendo el juego. Hay demasiado P2W (Pay to win) y eso le va quitando la diversión al juego, esto porque no se puede jugar el tiempo suficiente. Pero bueno, si aún piensas comprarlo, suerte. Lo único "destacable", es que con amigos sí puedes divertirte más, ya que hay comunicación (así es, no hay comunicación con personas random) y además, son tus amigos, deberías divertirte con ellos y no enojarte hahaha.

Unausgereiftes Spiel voller bugs. Ab und an mal macht es Spaß und die Idee ist ja ganz toll, aber abgesehen von einigen Bugs ist es einfach nur nervig, dass der Killer dazu fähig ist zu campen oder Tunneln, was den Spielspaß der einzelnen einfach nur auf 0 reduziert. Hinzu kommt noch, dass des öfteren mal Tasteneingaben nicht erkannt werden, sodass man einfach nur dämlich vor dem Haken steht und nichts macht, statt den überlebenden vom Haken zu befreien, obwohl man sehr wohl die dafür geforderte Taste drückt -.-" außerdem werden Killer immer mehr gepusht, während Überlebende dagegen einfach nur schwach sind.
